title: MR should not resign: SLPP PC members pass resolution
body_lines: The Provincial Council Members’ Forum of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) has unanimously passed a resolution that niether the Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa nor the government should resign.
The resolution was passed during a meeting held at Temple Trees this morning.
The Provincial Councillors also decided to coney the decision to President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
